snippet.title: Stunt GP #1
snippet.description:
Random video of me racing with an upgraded Phantom (I think that's what the car's name is. I want the Inferno but I can't buy it yet. I was also hoping to unlock the Team Machine but I haven't managed beating the lap times in order to get the thing.
I used to play this game a lot back in the day. I loved it and still do. I was hoping there would be something else like it but I have yet to find something.
The framerate isn't great but it's better without Fraps running to record the video. The music was put in the video after recording it - usually I drive either without music or with my iTunes running. I was planning on putting different music in it but to avoid copyrighting issues I just went for the default music. I even think I picked the correct tune for the location of the track, but I'm not so sure about that.
Anyhow, I know it's nothing special but I do hope you somehow enjoy it!
